name: FuckGlow
description: Hides all glow-related objects (including glow from blocks).

hideGlowDeco.name: Hide Glow Deco (99%)
hideGlowDeco.description:
[WINDOWS ONLY]
Hide 99% of glow decorations.

"But why only 99%?"

RobTop reuses the "blockOutline_14_001.png" and "blockOutline_15_001.png" frame names for multiple purposes. Unless if you enable the "Hide Glow Deco (100%)" option, these two frame names will not be hidden.

hideGlowDecoAdvanced.name: Hide Glow Deco (100%)
hideGlowDecoAdvanced.description:
[WINDOWS ONLY]
Hide ALL glow decorations. Requires previous setting to be enabled.
WILL CAUSE FALSE POSITIVES.
RobTop reuses the "blockOutline_14_001.png" and "blockOutline_15_001.png" frame names for multiple purposes. Even after Geode comes out of beta, it would still be impossible to differentiate between the frame name being used to texture a decoration object or being attached to a block.
ENABLE THIS AT YOUR OWN RISK.

hideGlowGameplayElements.name: Hide Glow from Gameplay Elements
hideGlowGameplayElements.description:
Hide glow from gameplay elements.
More specifically: jump orbs, speed portals, and jump pads.

disableGradientTriggers.name: Hide Glow from Gradient Triggers
disableGradientTriggers.description:
[WINDOWS AND ANDROID ONLY]
Hide glow from gradient triggers.

Not recommended unless if you know what you're doing.
